**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 44 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 [Accursed Forge-Spurned](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1568) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 32 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3) **Skills** **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** +3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _soul chain_ (_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)_; 11th level), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +24 **Will** +25 **HP** 285 (eternal damnation, [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), paralyzed, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), unconscious **Weaknesses** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10 **Eternal Damnation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) As long as its _soul chain_ remains intact, the accursed forge-spurned can't be truly destroyed and rises again fully healed at the next sundown, even if its physical body was destroyed. Information about _soul chains_ appears [here](/Monsters.aspx?ID=473).
**Searing Heat** ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) A creature that touches the accursed forge-spurned (including [grappling](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) it or hitting it with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack) takes 4d6 fire damage (DC 33 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _soul chain_ +31 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus 1d6 fire and soul siphon **Melee** _warhammer_ +31 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d8+14 bludgeoning **Inflate Bellows** **Requirement** The accursed forge-spurned has used Forge Breath. **Effect** The accursed forge-spurned re-inflates its flaccid lungs, enabling it to use Forge Breath again. **Forge Breath** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The accursed forge-spurned breathes a cloud of stinging soot, ash, and glowing embers. This can affect either a 30-foot cone or a 20-foot burst centered on the accursed forge-spurned and persists for 1d4 rounds. Creatures that move into or start their turn in the area take 12d6 fire damage (DC 36 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails its save is also [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 minute. Creatures within the cloud are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), though not from the accursed forge-spurned. The accursed forge-spurned can't use Forge Breath again until it has used Inflate Bellows. **Soul Chain** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) If a creature is slain by an attack from the soul chain and the accursed forge-spurned is able to retain the creature's corpse, it can bind the creature's soul into the _soul chain_ (as [_bind soul_](/Spells.aspx?ID=21)) with a day of work at a forge and a DC 20 [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) check. An individual whose soul is bound in this way can't be resurrected unless the _soul chain_ is destroyed (Hardness 10, 40 HP, BT 20). **Soul Siphon** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When the accursed forge-spurned critically hits a target with its soul chain, the chain leeches away a portion of the target's soul. The target must attempt a DC 36 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10).
**Failure** The target is drained 2.
**Critical Failure** The target is drained 2 and [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) from the pain.
name: Accursed Forge-Spurned
